summary: Moonfallia is a Khajiit Ranger follower with nightingale armor and bow.
descriptionHtml:
I do plan on expanding on moonfallia as i get better with modding as this is my first mod and possbily have her with her own personal voice acting.
she can be found in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun. Moon's primary stats are Archery, Light armor, and Sneak. give her a Dragonbone Bow or a Dragonskull Crossbow (Crossbows Basic Collection) to make her extremely deadly at a long distance. Moonfallia is compatible with all mods from what it seems. please report any bugs. I am also open to suggestions and help to make Moonfallia even better. Thank you.

Recommended Mods:
CBBE
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?

Killer Keos Skimpy CBBE Armor Replacer
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3654/?

Crossbows Basic Collection
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23876/?
author: Asrus
